meanings.definition: To swallow greedily or in large quantities.
meanings.sent1: The hungry dog ingurgitates its food as if it hasn't eaten in days.
meanings.sent2: She always ingurgitates her favorite snacks when watching movies.
meanings.sent3: The cookie jar seems to magically refill every time he ingurgitates its contents.
meanings.sent4: The vacuum cleaner ingurgitates all the dirt and dust from the carpet effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The river ingurgitates everything in its path during heavy rains.

meanings.sent1: The competitive eater ingurgitates hot dogs at an astonishing speed.
meanings.sent2: The bear ingurgitates berries and fish to prepare for hibernation.
meanings.sent3: The toddler ingurgitates his birthday cake, leaving a messy trail of crumbs.
meanings.sent4: The black hole ingurgitates everything that comes too close, even light.
meanings.sent5: The bookworm ingurgitates knowledge from every page she reads.
